name: Scare: Fatal Picture
description:
Scare: Fatal Picture is a survival horror game in which you must face a dangerous ghost tribe to save your sister.

Synopsis:
Your sister was kidnapped by a dangerous ghost tribe, to be killed and eaten by the queen.
You control Madoka, the older sister. Your goal is to find the tribe's hiding place and
save Sasuke, your younger sister.

Gameplay:
In a first-person perspective, you will face a ghost tribe.
Your weapon is your camera, you must use it to destroy your enemies by taking pictures of them.
In addition, you will be able to use your Camera to illuminate areas and destroy objects,
like masks, dolls, and seals to unlock doors.
